description:
11.176 noformat
Force libavfilter not to use any of the specified pixel formats for the
input to the next filter.

It accepts the following parameters:

pix_fmts.description: A '|' separated list of pixel format names

name: noformat

parameters.description: A ’|’-separated list of pixel format names, such as pix_fmts=yuv420p|monow|rgb24".
parameters.name: pix_fmts

source:
11.176 noformat

Force libavfilter not to use any of the specified pixel formats for the input to the next filter.

It accepts the following parameters:

pix_fmts

A ’|’-separated list of pixel format names, such as pix_fmts=yuv420p|monow|rgb24".
